title: Hexic HD
description: Single-player, HD (High Definition) Create clusters of same-colored tiles to clear them from the board. Sounds simple, right? The real fun of Hexic is in creating special patterns to earn special pieces. Create a flower to earn a starflower piece. Use starflower pieces to make another flower and earn the elusive black pearl. Make a cluster or flower out of black pearls to win the game. Are you up for the challenge? There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Hexic HD Theme Pack
childDownloads.description: Display the power of Hex on your Xbox 360 Dashboard with this downloadable theme pack. The collection includes four abstract, Hexic-inspired background images. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
